content: easy to crochet and fun to wear make a pretty peaceful poncho for yourself or a friend using lion brand mandala yarn watch the video tutorial on youtube https //youtu be/ftufmp2xta0 sizes xs to 4x using the craft yarn council standard woman size charts here https //www craftyarncouncil com/standards/woman-size the medium size sample poncho is shown on a model with a 38 96 5cm bust circumference if you are between two sizes make the larger size xs to fit chest size 28 -
